entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 8:14 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 8:14 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Overcast. Temperature steady near minus 11.
